borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
description: All rear garden, to reduce excessive shading and over reach into neighbours gardens.T1: Magnolia - light reduction- up to 1 metre reduction. Mainly on leading aerial growth maintaining crown aesthetic.T2: Silver Birch - Light reduction up to 1.5 metresT3: Magnolia - Reduction of aerial growth up to 2 metres matching in line shape determined by lateral growth.T4: Silver Birch - Conservative pruning of aerial growth up to 1.5 metres. Selective pruning of lateral growth to match.T5: Magnolia - Conservative pruning of aerial growth up to 1.5 metres. Selective pruning of lateral growth to match.T6: Silver Birch - Conservative pruning of aerial growth up to 1.5 metres. Selective pruning of lateral growth to match.T7: Magnolia - Reduction in height up to 2 metres Reduction of lateral reaching toward property.R1: (relating to T6) Silver birch roots - Careful Pruning of smaller protruding roots raising astroturf.
application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
